name: kefta skewers
ingredients: 500 g of ground meat (beef or a mix of beef/lamb)
5 sprigs of fresh coriander, stems removed
steps: Chop the coriander and mint. Set aside.
Chop the onion with the cumin, paprika, and ras el-hanout. Sauté for 5 minutes with the olive oil.
Add the ground meat, chopped coriander and mint, salt, and pepper. Mix well to combine all the ingredients (15 seconds in a food processor or by hand).
With wet hands, shape the meat into sausage-like shapes around the skewers.
Cook on a griddle, under the oven grill, or in a pan, turning them regularly until they are well cooked and golden.
Serve hot with a salad or raw vegetables.
